Title: Establishes the free speech protection act and prevents the transfer of information on legal protest activities to the federal government
Summary: Establishes the "free speech protection act"; prevents the transfer of information on legal protest activities to the federal government; establishes a civil right of action for violations of the act.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the "free speech protection act" and preventing the transfer of information on legal protest activities to the federal government
